name: Dandy Round Bedside Table
description: The Dandy Round Bedside Table by Kifu Paris is an elegant and luxurious home accent, inlaid in cream shagreen with bronze-patina brass details. This piece includes 1 drawer total and a cabinet below; the interiors are inlaid in gemelina wood veneer. Available in other finishes and as a square version. This piece is designed by Kifu Augousti, the daughter of Ria and Yiouri Augousti. Paris - 1 unit in stock in Denim Blue ShagreenSold individually All shagreen pieces are hand-dyed by artisans. Currently made to order 8-10 weeks.
